title: Calories in Soba Noodles
meta_description: Discover calories in soba noodles per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better nutrition tracking.
assumptions: Cooked soba noodles (buckwheat-based), plain, boiled without added salt, oil, or sauce; standard serving basis.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, buckwheat ratio, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked soba noodles provides ~99 kcal and ~5g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp sesame oil for stir-fry

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of cooked soba noodles?
Are soba noodles low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.1g fat per 100g cooked, making them a light option.

faqs.q: What's the protein in soba noodles?

faqs.a: Minimal fiber at 0g per 100g; opt for whole buckwheat varieties for more.

faqs.q: Calories in a typical serving of soba noodles?
faqs.a: A standard 150g cooked serving is about 149 kcal; adjust for portion size.
